extendedInfo.description: The Mirror is Federal Way's first choice for local news and happenings. And if *you* care about our community, you count on the Mirror for local news, opinion, sports and coverage of the arts. Our app brings you everything from our site and more, including: - Our award-winning local and regional news - Send us your news photos or video right from your mobile phone - Sports - Entertainment - Business news - Opinions and letters to the editor - Local blogs - Weather - Traffic - Intuitive, patent-pending navigation - Easy news sharing by e-mail, text message and post to Twitter and Facebook - And moreâ¦ Today, with weekly print publication and daily online updates as part of Sound Publishing Inc., the Mirror is committed to keeping 33,000 households - and, via the Internet, our many friends and family members abroad - up to date on this amazing community around them. Annual special sections highlight local leaders and volunteers, women in business, scholars and athletes, and tourism destinations. If it happens in Federal Way, we've got it covered. We care about our community, because you do too.

reviews.title: Very well done
reviews.comment: Works fantastically. Easy navigation and very polished. Glad I checked the play store to give this app another try. Holding my fifth star until I see how often it\'s updated.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Horrible force close dosent work crap the epic rocks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Couldn\'t use, force close too often. Droid incredible
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is \" the mirror\" a newspaper...NOT A MIRROR! 3 stars because it does what it says.
reviews.author: A Google User
